Module com.example.breakout_clone

Package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game

package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game

This package contains the classes that are controller for the different game views that are present during the game. Some of the controllers are running throughout the game, whist others are created when their respective views are created.

Author:
Praket Chavan
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    DebugController
    The controller class for the debug window.
    GameController
    This class is the main controller for the game, which handles all the user input when playing the game.
    GameEndController
    Controller class for the GameOverView and the GameCompleteView.
    HighScoreController
    Controller class for the HighScoreView.
    PauseMenuController
    Controller class for the PauseMenuView view.
    StartScreenController
    Controller class for the StartScreenView.fxml.
